content.rendered:
Pandora Boxchain is a decentralized protocol & network for artificial intelligence. Generic computing on Prometheus consensus with open/free market for software, computing power and data. 

Requirements:

  • Ethereum smart contracts based network
  • ability to perform distributed AI computing in secure environment

Challenges we faced:

  • Developers of neural networks, owners of datasets and computing capacities should be able to sell their services in a trustless environment, without intermediaries and censorship.
  • Complicated platform logic and workflows should be based on a public blockchain.
  • Such a large network with a huge amount of off-chain computations requires excellent optimization for a fee reduction.

Solution:

  •  developing of over 35 interconnected smart contracts;
  • optimizing and structuring them in order to reduce the user’s fees.

Technologies we used: 

  • Solidity
  • JavaScript
  • Truffle.js
  • Ganache
